name: Necromaster
description:
Become the Necromaster, commander of life and death itself! Use your abilities to battle through an ancient crypt and take control of your fallen foes to solve puzzles and escape.

Lauren Henry - Programming

Addison Bugdonovitch - Art, 3D Modelling, Animations

Mixamo - Player animations

Pixabay - Audio

This was a submission to the 2023.1 Brackeys Game Jam, made in a week!
